body_html: If it is only the first image that is very slow, it is very likely that your TensorFlow was not compiled with the right compute capability. So JIT is taking that much time. If you build TensorFlow from source, please make sure to enable "7.0" for V100 support. Thanks!
body_text: If it is only the first image that is very slow, it is very likely that your TensorFlow was not compiled with the right compute capability. So JIT is taking that much time. If you build TensorFlow from source, please make sure to enable "7.0" for V100 support. Thanks!
body: If it is only the first image that is very slow, it is very likely that your TensorFlow was not compiled with the right compute capability. So JIT is taking that much time. If you build TensorFlow from source, please make sure to enable "7.0" for V100 support. Thanks!
